node.html:
• Provide SaaS solutions (Ada, C++) within Military Avionics and Helicopters, Tactical, Communication, and Maintenance Systems.
  • Build automated testing scripts (unit, integration, system) in Python using a TDD framework.
  • Participate in daily, agile sprints/daily scrum to efficiently meet critical deadlines while reducing resource expenditures.

• Implement front- and back-end features and processes using applied business intelligence; redesign the customer account page that includes features such as email subscription preferences, payment profile, contact support option directly from the user account
  • Engineer and launch a conversational Chatbot which draws upon a knowledge base and reliance factor to reply to users in real-time
  • Work with a variety of different languages, platforms, frameworks, and content management systems such as JavaScript, Java, Python, Tensorflow, Github, Spring, and Hibernate
  • Communicate with multi-disciplinary teams of engineers, designers, producers, and clients on a daily basis

• Fostered a collaborative and results-driven office culture using positive recognition, team initiatives, and mentorship
  • Motivated employees to ensure productivity and timely completion of projects according to client needs
  • Consulted with clients to create a comprehensive tax plan for all situations and economic status
  • Oversaw a dedicated team of 12 tax preparation professionals
  • Administered day-to-day operations of office site
